original_title: Amon Amarth: Surtur Rising - Bloodshed Over Bochum
overview: Bonus DVD with over three hours of live concert footage filmed during the "Bloodshed Over Bochum" concert series in 2008 where Amon Amarth played the first four albums on four successive nights.
title: Amon Amarth: Surtur Rising - Bloodshed Over Bochum
